title: Google\Cloud\Datastore\V1\Mutation
name: Mutation
description:
A mutation to apply to an entity.

Generated from protobuf message google.datastore.v1.Mutation

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.insert
params.description: The entity to insert. The entity must not already exist. The entity key's final path element may be incomplete.

params.name: data.update
params.description: The entity to update. The entity must already exist. Must have a complete key path.

params.name: data.upsert
params.description: The entity to upsert. The entity may or may not already exist. The entity key's final path element may be incomplete.

params.name: data.delete
params.description: The key of the entity to delete. The entity may or may not already exist. Must have a complete key path and must not be reserved/read-only.

params.name: data.base_version
params.description: The version of the entity that this mutation is being applied to. If this does not match the current version on the server, the mutation conflicts.
